web_snippets: Jared Brock is the author of three books and the director-producer of documentaries including Red Light Green Light, Over 18, and Josiah.
Jared Brock is an award-winning author, cell-free futurist, and director of several films including PBS's *Redeeming Uncle Tom* with Danny Glover.
Jared Brock is the author of A Year of Living Prayerfully, Bearded Gospel Men, and The Road to Dawn. He is also the director of Over 18, Red Light Green Light, ...
